snippet: A classified report on the Army’s investigation into Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s disappearance in June 2009 says he had left assigned areas before and then returned, according to people briefed on it.
abstract: Classified military report detailing Army’s investigation into disappearance of Sgt Bowe Bergdahl in June 2009 cites his previous wanderings away from assigned areas; notes he took unauthorized walks away from a training range in California and from his remote outpost in Afghanistan, and then returned; officials acknowledge many unanswered questions remain about his disappearance.

byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: A classified report on the Army’s investigation into Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s disappearance in June 2009 says he had left assigned areas before and then returned, according to people briefed on it.

headline.main: Bergdahl Is Said to Have History of Leaving Post
headline.print_headline: Bergdahl Is Said to Have History of Leaving Post

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
